languages.text:
В наземных боях можно использовать особые способности — {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}. Каждый персонаж в отряде может использовать героический акт или отчаянные меры только один раз за бой. При этом отчаянные меры можно применять не чаще одного раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Доступность особых способностей зависит от значения {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} — если он достиг 175, то становится доступен героический акт, если он опустился ниже 25, то открываются отчаянные меры.
В космических боях также доступны особые способности персонажей, отличающиеся от тех, что у них есть в наземном бою. За бой можно использовать только одну особую способность. Шкала особых способностей корабля заполняется постепенно — ее значение увеличивается каждый ход, в конце боя, а также во время некоторых событий в космосе.

traits.locale_text:
В наземных боях можно использовать особые способности — {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}. Каждый персонаж в отряде может использовать героический акт или отчаянные меры только один раз за бой. При этом отчаянные меры можно применять не чаще одного раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Доступность особых способностей зависит от значения {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} — если он достиг 175, то становится доступен героический акт, если он опустился ниже 25, то открываются отчаянные меры.
В космических боях также доступны особые способности персонажей, отличающиеся от тех, что у них есть в наземном бою. За бой можно использовать только одну особую способность. Шкала особых способностей корабля заполняется постепенно — ее значение увеличивается каждый ход, в конце боя, а также во время некоторых событий в космосе.

languages.text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.
languages.original_text:
В наземных боях можно использовать особые способности — {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}. Каждый персонаж в отряде может использовать героический акт или отчаянные меры только один раз за бой. При этом отчаянные меры можно применять не чаще одного раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Доступность особых способностей зависит от значения {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} — если он достиг 175, то становится доступен героический акт, если он опустился ниже 25, то открываются отчаянные меры.
В космических боях также доступны особые способности персонажей, отличающиеся от тех, что у них есть в наземном бою. За бой можно использовать только одну особую способность. Шкала особых способностей корабля заполняется постепенно — ее значение увеличивается каждый ход, в конце боя, а также во время некоторых событий в космосе.

traits.locale_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. Furthermore, the party can only use one ability of this type per round. These abilities become available depending on momentum value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then the desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of special abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one special ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. Furthermore, the party can only use one ability of this type per round. These abilities become available depending on momentum value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then the desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of special abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one special ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

languages.text:
Es gibt spezielle Fähigkeiten, die im Bodenkampf genutzt werden können: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g}. Jeder Charakter kann pro Kampf nur entweder eine Heldentat oder eine Verzweiflungstat nutzen. Die Gruppe kann nur eine Verzweiflungstat pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} nutzen. Die Verfügbarkeit dieser Fähigkeiten hängt vom {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}-Wert der Gruppe ab. Wenn die Dynamik der Gruppe 175 erreicht, kann ein Charakter eine Heldentat vollbringen. Liegt der Dynamikwert bei 25 oder darunter, werden Verzweiflungstaten verfügbar.
Im Weltraumkampf können die Charaktere eine Reihe von ultimativen Fähigkeiten nutzen, die ihnen im Bodenkampf nicht zur Verfügung stehen. Pro Kampf kann nur eine ultimative Fähigkeit genutzt werden. Die Anzeige, die die Ladung der ultimativen Fähigkeit darstellt, füllt sich allmählich in jeder Runde des Kampfes, am Ende eines Kampfes und während bestimmter Ereignisse im All.
languages.original_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

traits.locale_text:
Es gibt spezielle Fähigkeiten, die im Bodenkampf eingesetzt werden können: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g}. Jeder Charakter kann pro Kampf entweder eine Heldentat oder eine Verzweiflungstat einsetzen, und zwar nur einmal. Außerdem kann die Gruppe nur eine Fähigkeit dieser Art pro Runde einsetzen. Die Verfügbarkeit dieser Fähigkeiten hängt vom Dynamikwert der Gruppe ab. Wenn die Dynamik der Gruppe 175 erreicht, kann ein Charakter eine Heldentat vollbringen. Liegt der Dynamikwert bei 25 oder darunter, werden Verzweiflungstaten verfügbar.
Im Weltraumkampf können die Charaktere eine Reihe von Spezialfähigkeiten einsetzen, die ihnen im Bodenkampf nicht zur Verfügung stehen. Pro Kampf kann nur eine Spezialfähigkeit eingesetzt werden. Die Anzeige, die die Ladung der Spezialfähigkeit darstellt, füllt sich allmählich in jeder Runde des Kampfes, am Ende eines Kampfes und während bestimmter Ereignisse im All.

languages.text:
Les capacités spéciales suivantes peuvent être utilisées lors des combats au sol : {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g}. Chaque personnage ne peut utiliser un acte héroïque ou une mesure désespérée qu'une seule fois par combat. Le groupe ne peut utiliser qu'une seule capacité de ce type par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. La disponibilité de ces capacités dépend de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} du groupe. Cette valeur doit être supérieure ou égale à 175 points pour permettre à un personnage d'utiliser un acte héroïque. Et elle doit être inférieure ou égale à 25 points pour qu'il puisse utiliser une mesure désespérée.
Lors des combats spatiaux, les personnages ont accès à des capacités ultimes différentes de celles qui sont disponibles au sol. Et ils ne peuvent utiliser qu'une seule capacité ultime par combat. La jauge représentant le niveau de charge de la capacité ultime se remplit progressivement à chaque round de combat, à la fin du combat et lors de certains événements spatiaux.
languages.original_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

traits.locale_text:
Les capacités spéciales suivantes peuvent être utilisées lors des combats terrestres : {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g}. Chaque personnage ne peut utiliser un acte héroïque ou une mesure désespérée qu'une seule fois par combat. De plus, le groupe ne peut utiliser qu'une seule capacité de ce type par round. La disponibilité de ces capacités dépend de la valeur de fougue du groupe. Celle-ci doit être supérieure ou égale à 175 pour permettre à un personnage d'utiliser un acte héroïque. Et elle doit être inférieure ou égale à 25 pour qu'il puisse utiliser une mesure désespérée.
Lors des combats spatiaux, les personnages ont accès à des capacités spéciales différentes de celles qui sont disponibles pour les combats terrestres. Et ils ne peuvent utiliser qu'une seule capacité spéciale par combat. La jauge représentant la charge de la capacité spéciale se remplit progressivement à chaque round de combat, à la fin du combat et lors de certains événements spatiaux.

languages.text:
在地面战斗中，您可以使用两种特殊能力：{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。每位角色每场战斗中只能使用一次英雄壮举或背水一战。此外，您的队伍每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能使用一次背水一战能力。特殊能力对队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气值{/g}有要求。当队伍的士气不低于175点时，您的角色可以使用英雄壮举。当队伍的士气不高于25点时，您的角色可以使用背水一战。
在太空战斗期间，您的角色拥有截然不同的终极能力，这些能力在地面战斗中无法使用。您的角色每场战斗中只能使用一项终极能力。终极能力会在战斗的每轮中、战斗结束时，以及太空战斗之外的某些事件中进行充能。
languages.original_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

traits.locale_text:
在地面战斗中，您可以使用两种特殊能力：{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。每位角色每场战斗中只能使用一次英雄壮举或背水一战。此外，您的队伍每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能使用一次背水一战能力。特殊能力对队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气值{/g}有要求。当队伍的士气不低于175点时，您的角色可以使用英雄壮举。当队伍的士气不高于25点时，您的角色可以使用背水一战。
在太空战斗期间，您的角色拥有截然不同的终极能力，这些能力在地面战斗中无法使用。您的角色每场战斗中只能使用一项终极能力。终极能力会在战斗的每轮中、战斗结束时，以及太空战斗之外的某些事件中进行充能。

languages.text:
Hay capacidades especiales que se pueden usar durante el combate terrestre: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}. Cada personaje solo puede usar un acto heroico o una medida desesperada por combate. Además, tu grupo solo puede utilizar una capacidad de este tipo por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Estas capacidades pasan a estar disponibles en función del {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. Si el ímpetu del grupo llega a 175, un personaje puede usar un acto heroico. Si el ímpetu baja a 25 o menos, las medidas desesperadas pasan a estar disponibles.
Durante el combate espacial, los personajes disponen de una serie de capacidades definitivas diferentes a las que usan en el combate terrestre. Solo se puede usar una capacidad definitiva por combate. El medidor que indica la carga de capacidad definitiva se va llenando con cada asalto, al final del combate y durante ciertos eventos en el espacio.
languages.original_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

traits.locale_text:
Hay {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades especiales{/g} que se pueden usar durante el combate terrestre: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}. Cada personaje solo puede usar un {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}acto heroico{/g} o una medida desesperada por combate. Además, tu grupo solo puede utilizar una capacidad de este tipo por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Estas capacidades pasan a estar disponibles en función del {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. Si el ímpetu del grupo llega a 175, un personaje puede usar un acto heroico. Si el ímpetu baja a 25 o menos, las medidas desesperadas pasan a estar disponibles.
Durante el combate espacial, los personajes disponen de una serie de capacidades diferentes a las que usan en el combate terrestre. Solo se puede usar una capacidad especial por combate. El medidor que indica la carga de capacidad especial se va llenando con cada asalto, al final del combate y durante ciertos eventos en el espacio.

languages.text:
地上戦闘で使用できる特別なアビリティがある。：{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}だ。各キャラクターは英雄的行為または非常手段のいずれかを1回の戦闘につき1回使用できる。非常手段は全パーティーで1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき1回だけ使用できる。これらのアビリティは部隊{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}数値によって使用可能になる。部隊推進力が175に達すれば、キャラクターは英雄的行為が使える。推進力数値が25以下ならば、非常階段が使用可能になる。
宇宙戦闘では、キャラクターは地上戦闘では使用できない様々な究極アビリティを使用できる。究極アビリティは1度の戦闘につき1回のみ使用できる。究極アビリティのチャージを表すゲージは、戦闘の各ラウンド中、戦闘終了時、および特定の宇宙イベント中に徐々に溜まっていく。
languages.original_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.

traits.locale_text:
地上戦闘で使用できる特別なアビリティがある。：{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常階段{/g}だ。各キャラクターは英雄的行為または非常手段のいずれかを1回の戦闘につき1回使用できる。さらに、部隊はこのタイプのアビリティを1ラウンドにつき1回だけ使用できる。これらのアビリティは部隊推進力数値によって使用可能になる。部隊推進力が175に達すれば、キャラクターは英雄的行為が使える。推進力数値が25以下ならば、非常階段が使用可能になる。
宇宙戦闘では、キャラクターは地上戦闘では使用できない様々な特別なアビリティを使用できる。特別なアビリティは1度の戦闘につき1回のみ使用できる。特別なアビリティのチャージを表すゲージは、戦闘の各ラウンド中、戦闘終了時、および特定の宇宙イベント中に徐々に溜まっていく。

languages.text:
Kara çatışmasında kullanılabilen özel kabiliyetler bulunur: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Kahramanca eylemler{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemler{/g}. Her karakter, bir çatışmada yalnızca bir kez kahramanca eylem veya son çare önlem kullanabilir. Bir son çare önlem, tüm grup tarafından bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde sadece bir kez kullanılabilir. Bu kabiliyetler, grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} değerine bağlı olarak kullanılabilir hâle gelir. Grubun momentumu 175'e ulaşırsa karakterlerden biri kahramanca eylem yapabilir. Momentum değeri 25 veya altına düşmüşse de son çare önlemler kullanılabilir hâle gelir.
Karakterler, uzay çatışmasında kara çatışmasında yer almayan farklı bir dizi üstün kabiliyetten yararlanabilirler. Bir çatışmada yalnızca bir üstün kabiliyet kullanılabilir. Üstün kabiliyet sayacı; her çatışma raundunda, çatışmanın sonunda ve belirli bazı uzay olayları sırasında kademeli olarak dolar.
languages.original_text:
There are special abilities which can be used in ground combat: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. Each character can only use either a heroic act or a desperate measure once per combat. A desperate measure can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} by the whole party. These abilities become available depending on the party's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value. If the party's momentum reaches 175, a character can use a heroic act. If momentum value is 25 or lower, then desperate measures become available.
In space combat the characters can use a different set of ultimate abilities not available to them in ground combat. Only one ultimate ability can be used per combat. The gauge representing ultimate ability charge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain space events.
